thread.title: Instagram takes on Apple’s Live Photos with new 1-second video loop app, Boomerang
thread.title_full: Instagram takes on Apple’s Live Photos with new 1-second video loop app, Boomerang - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Instagram takes on Apple’s Live Photos with new 1-second video loop app, Boomerang
text: Instagram is expanding its range of apps further today by introducing a new video-looping service to rival the likes of HTC Zoe and the iPhone’s baked-in Live Photos. Boomerang takes a quick burst of photos in-app, and then turns them in to a moving photo, or video, that loops forward and backward. Don’t call it […] »
